A bachelor's degree in communication introduces undergraduates to topics like technical communication, mass communication, and public relations.

titel: Bachelor of Science in Athletic Training
details: The Bachelor of Science (BS) in Athletic Training degree at Grand Canyon University (GCU) gives graduates hands-on experience at becoming athletic trainers.

titel: Bachelor of Arts in Advertising and Graphic Design
details: Advertising and graphic design is a field for creative thinkers who are also effective problem solvers. Advertising and design professionals collaborate with their co-workers and clients to present brands in a desirable light across multiple mediums.

A Bachelor of Arts in Dance degree from GCU prepares you for a future career in the arts. Dance majors who graduate from this program may enter the professional realm of concert dance, commercial dance, musical theatre, or studio dance teaching..

titel: Bachelor of Arts in History for Secondary Education
details: The Bachelor of Arts in History for Secondary Education degree program at Grand Canyon University recognizes that middle and high school history teachers do more than teach facts, events and dates—they impart ethical standards and wisdom developed over centuries of human history.

titel: Bachelor of Arts in Worship Arts
details: The BA in Worship Arts with an Emphasis in Worship Ministry program at GCU prepares students for careers in worship leadership and ministry. The worship ministry emphasis allows GCU students to focus on the creativity, artistry, musical ability and performance aspects of ministerial leadership.
